title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 333.2 - Payment of interest on death benefits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 333.2 - Payment of interest on death benefits

State Regulations

The rate of interest for unpaid accidental and ordinary death
benefits, to accrue from the date of death of the member until payment of the
benefit is made, is as follows: (a) for those benefits due as a result of death prior to April 1, 1983, three per
centum per annum; and
(b) for those
benefits due as a result of death on or after April 1, 1983, five per centum
per annum. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
333.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
